comments.body: Thank you for the advice on how to control oneself and avoid engaging in criminal activity because of a desire for money. comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Our society celebrates money more than good deeds. People no longer recognize people with outstanding characters but plenty of money regardless of how they acquired it. Parents no longer care where their children got money to buy cars and houses because they have been blinded by the love of money. I have always advised my friends and family to be content with what they have because what they have now is better than what they haven't got. If you want to earn more, then learn more and work harder. I don't need to acquire much money to be happy because happiness is not a product of how much you have. We should know that it is not everyone that will be rich because opportunities are not equally distributed.
